document.full_text: almost two years after pakistan's army swept through the swat valley to drive out a terrifying taliban regime, the valley's residents fear that slow economic recovery in the area could undo military gains and allow a militant return.
document.title: slow government development threatens swat military
lines_and_colors: almost two years after pakistan's army swept through the swat valley to drive out a terrifying taliban regime, the valley's residents fear that slow economic recovery in the area could undo military gains and allow a militant return.
